Package server

Class ReportSaver

java.lang.Object
server.ReportSaver
public class ReportSaver extends Object
The ReportSaver class is responsible for saving and loading monthly reports. It handles the serialization and deserialization of reports to and from JSON files.

  • Method Details

    • saveReports

      public static void saveReports(List<BorrowReport> borrowReport, List<SubscriberReport> subscriberReport, String monthYear)
      Saves the borrow and subscriber reports for a given month and year. In the format YYYY-MM, the reports are saved in the reports directory.
      Parameters:
      borrowReport - the list of borrow reports to save
      subscriberReport - the list of subscriber reports to save
      monthYear - the month and year in MM-yyyy format
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs while saving the reports

    • saveReport

      private static void saveReport(Object report, String fileName)
      Saves a report to a specified file.
      Parameters:
      report - the report object to save
      fileName - the name of the file to save the report to
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs while saving the report

    • getReportMonths

      public static List<String> getReportMonths()
      Retrieves a list of months for which reports are available.
      Returns:
      a list of month-year strings in yyyy-MM format

    • loadBorrowReport

      public static List<BorrowReport> loadBorrowReport(String monthYear)
      Loads the borrow reports for a given month and year.
      Parameters:
      monthYear - the month and year in MM-yyyy format
      Returns:
      a list of borrow reports
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs while loading the reports

    • loadSubscriberReport

      public static List<SubscriberReport> loadSubscriberReport(String monthYear)
      Loads the subscriber reports for a given month and year.
      Parameters:
      monthYear - the month and year in MM-yyyy format
      Returns:
      a list of subscriber reports
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs while loading the reports

    • loadReport

      private static <T> T loadReport(String fileName, Type reportType)
      Loads a report from a specified file.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the report
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the file to load the report from
      reportType - the type of the report to load
      Returns:
      the loaded report
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs while loading the report
